SEARCH
Package Menus

Class PatientMenu

Object
BaseMenu<PatientService>
PatientMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMenu<PatientService>
public class PatientMenu extends BaseMenu<PatientService>
Menu class for patient-specific operations. Extends BaseMenu to provide a menu-driven interface for patients to interact with the hospital management system.

  • Field Summary

    sc

      Parameters:

      sc - the Scanner instance for reading user input.
